data.title: List of EA Play games
data.text:
EA Play Developers Electronic Arts Release dates Windows January 12, 2016

This is a list of games available on the EA Play (formerly Origin Access) subscription service. Note that as the service is separated to two different tiers, subscribers can in some cases have access to different games and/or content. The games available also differ between the platforms (Origin and Steam), as well as countries.

The Pro tier includes all games of the base tier, and in some cases adds exclusive titles or additional bonus content, however this tier is exclusive to Origin.

Subscription Games EA Play Pro (Origin) 158 (+ additional content in 13 games) EA Play (Origin) 102 EA Play (Steam) 93

Game is included with both EA Play tiers on Origin, with additional bonus content offered to the Pro tier. Game is exclusive to the EA Play Pro tier on Origin.
